Class NxtColorSensor

  • java.lang.Object

  • public class NxtColorSensor
extends Sensor
    Class that represents a color sensor (Lego NXT Color Sensor)

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      NxtColorSensor()
      Creates a sensor instance connected to port S1.
      NxtColorSensor(SensorPort port)
      Creates a sensor instance connected to the given port.

      Returns the intensity of the detected light.

      • getColor

        public java.awt.Color getColor()
        Returns a java.awt.Color reference to the color reading.
        Returns:
        the RGB color

      • getColorInt

        public int getColorInt()
        Returns the color as integer value of the color reading. Red in bits 0..6, Green in bits 7..15, Blue in bits 16..23, 1 in bits 24..31.
        Returns:
        color int

      • getLightValue

        public int getLightValue()
        Returns the intensity of the detected light.
        Returns:
        light intensity (0..1023)

      • setFloodlight

        public void setFloodlight(int colorValue)
        Turns the red, green or blue LED on or all off.
        Parameters:
        colorValue - 0: red, 1: green, 2: blue, -1: all off
